list.title: backEnd.js
list.description:
Sets up an Express backend server for examples, serving static files, replacing HTML strings, and enabling a game socket service. The behavior adapts based on the environment mode (NODE_ENV) inject in process.env with cross-env package. See {@link https://nodejs.org/api/process.html#processenv-env}, {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/cross-env}

requires {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ud-viz/game_node} requires {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ud-viz/utils_shared} requires {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/reload} requires {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/string-replace-middleware}

list.title: changeVersionPackageJSON
list.description: Updates the version number in a package.json file and updates the dependencies that start with "@ud-viz/" to the same version number.

list.title: devExamples.js
list.description:
This script executes build and runs the backend script.

requires {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/child-process-promise} requires {@link https://nodejs.org/api/child_process.html}

list.title: prePublish.js
list.description:
Performs version management tasks within a monorepo:

  • Updates package.json files and dependencies to the provided version
  • Formats code with prettier
  • Executes reset and generates changelog diffs

list.title: printExec
list.description: Prints the stdout and stderr of a command execution result.

list.title: printExec
list.description: Prints the stdout and stderr of a command execution result.

list.title: runBackEnd~child
list.description: Spawn a child process to run the 'backEnd.js' script with specific settings.

list.title: version
list.description: The version argument provided from the command line.
